---
title: "Machu Picchu, Peru"
---

A mountain fortress fit for a Sapa Inca.

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE}
mountain <- paste("<b>Rainbow Mountain</b>")
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  setView(-71.357420, -13.865918, zoom = 14) %>%
  addMarkers(-71.357420, -13.865918, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = mountain) 
```
